edu.fit.cs.cn.util

Class Util

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.fit.cs.cn.util.Util

  • public class Util
extends java.lang.Object
    Util.java
    Usage: This class maintains the node map and transmission queue.
    Also offers methods to convert data from int to byte and vice versa.
    Author:
    Group7
